author: vicepool
title: ADAPlus - Pool Boost
description: Delegators who support small mission-driven SPO do not get rewards until the pool gains an impressive stake amount. SPO is also at a loss.
solution: Pool Boost distributes 100% of its profit to SPOs. Delegators vote for SPOs and redelegate directly once the targeted amount is reached.
experience: Two co-proposers. Over 15y of experience as SW engineers, entrepreneurs, marketers. From the developers of CardanoWall and ADAPlus.
